DOC.detailed_description: This study include : Three study visit MS Center Evergreen ; wear pedometer two , one-week period record walk regular daily activity ; keep diary walking problem fall slip . Subjects must meet following criterion : Diagnosis MS ( form ) ; 18-70 year age ; stable MS treatment OR MS treatment last three month ; schedule hospitalization next six month .
